Plot: Inspector Surjan Shekhawat, who is dealing with a depressing past, has to investigate a high profile murder case, deal with his crumbling marriage and use the help and solace of a prostitute by the name of Rosie.
Title: Talaash
Writer: Farhan Akhtar (dialogue), Anurag Kashyap (additional dialogue), Zoya Akhtar (story), Reema Kagti (story), Zoya Akhtar (screenplay), Reema Kagti (screenplay)
Actors: Aamir Khan, Nawazuddin Siddiqui, Kareena Kapoor, Rani Mukerji
